directions.step:
Date: Wed, 28 Feb 1996 12:45:14 -0800
From: Don <dja@netvoyage.net>
Cream butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add flour, lemon extract, and 7UP; mix well. Pour into greased angel food (or bundt) pan. Bake 325F for 1 hour and 15 minutes or until done. Sprinkle with confectioner's sugar.
MM-RECIPES@IDISCOVER.NET
MEAL-MASTER RECIPES LIST SERVER
MM-RECIPES DIGEST V3 #61
